name: 郭志宇
objective: The course is a general survey of principles of chemistry and properties of matter of general interest to the engineer. They are explained in terms of modern chemical theory with emphasis on conceptual problems. The selected topics include gas phase, the electronic structure of atoms, periodic relationships, chemical bonding, kinetics, acid base equilibrium, the chemistry of metallic and nonmetallic elements, and organic molecules, the change of states, synthetic polymers materials, electrochemistry, energy sources for the future.
